Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Cristal München, you'll be centrally located in Munich, convenient to Klinikum Grosshadern and Marienplatz. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Karlsplatz - Stachus and St. Paul's Church.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Cristal München. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-out, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 7 meeting rooms available for events. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Cristal München. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Klinikum Grosshadern - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Karlsplatz - Stachus - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
St. Paul's Church - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

Konigsplatz - 1 km / 0.6 mi
German Brewery Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Jewish Museum Munich - 1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Cristal München is Munich (MUC-Franz Josef Strauss Intl.) - 29.5 km / 18.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Cristal is Munich (MUC-Franz Josef Strauss Intl.) - 29.7 km / 18.4 mi.
